Title: Establishes the crime of aggravated criminal sale of a controlled substance resulting in serious physical injury
Summary: Amends the offense of murder in the second degree to include when a person knowingly distributes fentanyl or any substance containing fentanyl and as a result of such distribution causes the death of another person; establishes the crime of aggravated criminal sale of a controlled substance resulting in serious physical injury.
LawCode: Amd ยง125.25, add ยง120.12-a, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to fentanyl
